title: how-to-1
body:
This backgrounder has interactive components such as drops-downs, tabs, and hotspots that must be completed before moving forward.

Selecting the progress bar in the top right of the screen will display all the interactive items within the chapter. Once the progress bar is filled, you can progress to the next chapter.

title: how-to-2
body: At the end of each chapter, answer the 'Check Your Progress' questions to complete the chapter.

title: how-to-3
body: Glossary terms are highlighted throughout this backgrounder. The glossary can also be accessed by selecting the menu on the right.

title: b-98-1
body: Select the Quick Fact! and Zoom In icons at the margins to display callouts with additional information.

_loopStyleComment.allPages: loop sequentially through all pages in course
_loopStyleComment.siblings: loop sequentially through all pages in current parent object
_loopStyleComment.none: disable previous and next buttons at start and end of the pages in the current parent object

title: Module Summary
body:
Upon completion of this module, learners will be able to:

Understanding key concepts:
Learners grasp the fundamental ideas and principles related to the subject matter of the module.

Skill acquisition:
Practical skills pertinent to their field or interests are learned and can be applied in real-world situations.

Critical thinking:
Improved ability to analyze, evaluate, and synthesize information from the module.

title: Introduction Nav
body:
Be sure that all callouts and interactivities are completed before moving forward.

Select the progress bar at the top right of the screen for any missed interactions.

title: Hot graphic
body: Hotspot Images should always use the same icon, unless otherwise dictated by the storyboard and be colored the same as the ‘callout’ icons to the right. _loopStyleComment.siblings: loop sequentially through all pages in current parent object

_loopStyleComment.allPages: loop sequentially through all pages in course
_loopStyleComment.siblings: loop sequentially through all pages in current parent object
_loopStyleComment.none: disable previous and next buttons at start and end of the pages in the current parent object

title: Question 1
body: Single multiple choice example
instruction: Choose {{#if _isRadio}}one option{{else}}one or more options{{/if}} then select Submit.

_incorrect.final:
Incorrect

Please review the correct answer before moving on.

title: Question 2
body: Multiple select example
instruction: Choose {{#if _isRadio}}one option{{else}}one or more options{{/if}} then select Submit.

_incorrect.final:
Incorrect

Please review the correct answer before moving on.

title: Matching
instruction: Choose an option from each dropdown list and select Submit.

_incorrect.final:
Incorrect

Please review the correct answer before moving on.

_bands.feedbackNotFinal:
Sorry, but you didn't pass.
Why not give it another try? You have used {{attemptsSpent}} of {{attempts}} attempt(s), Take some time to review the course before giving it another try.
_bands.feedback: Good effort, but your score was below 25%.

title: Congratulations
body: You've completed The Module course. You may exit the course by clicking the “X” in the upper right of the browser window in which you viewed the course. Thank you.
